Hello {{user.first_name}} {{user.last_name}}

Thanks for contacting us! I am reviewing your ticket , and will get back to you as soon as possible. To add additional comments, reply to this email, or follow the ticket link.In the meantime, we encourage you to check our Community Portal (https://community.logpoint.com/) for additional information and practical insights about LogPoint.

Regards
